Room.Name: Path Through the Mountains of Dhoom
Room.Description: The path winds its way up the mountainside, surrounded by jagged rocks and towering peaks. The air is crisp and the sky overhead is obscured by thick clouds, casting a foreboding shadow over the landscape. The trail is narrow and treacherous, with loose stones and rocky outcroppings littering the way. Despite its dangers, the path continues deeper into the heart of the mountains, beckoning travelers to brave the unknown.

Room.Name: Path Through the Mountains of Dhoom
Room.Description: The path winds its way up the mountainside, surrounded by jagged rocks and towering peaks. Room.Name: Path Through the Mountains of Dhoom

The trail is narrow and treacherous, with loose stones and rocky outcroppings littering the way. Despite its dangers, the path continues deeper into the heart of the mountains, beckoning travelers to brave the unknown.

Room.Name: A Screaming Cave
Room.Description: It seems someone or something has carved a large face into the side of this mountain before you. A look of excitement and mischevious wonder strikes the massive stone being as he opens his mouth to speak to you.

Room.Name: Inside the mouth
Room.Description: After coming through the opening of the cave, you realize the giant mouth has decided to shut. Looking back at the would be exit, you see no other way to go but deeper into the cave.

Room.Name: Casual thoughts
Room.Description: All around you is a world which doesn't seem to have any normal bounds or structure. The hallway around you changes constantly. The colors, the texture, the lighting, and even the sounds twist and distort before your very eyes. You notice a sign floating casually around the now forming purple clouds off to the right of you.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sign floating before you is hard to read but you eventually make out the words, "You have entered the mind of a madman. Enjoy your stay."

Room.Name: Casual thoughts
Room.Description: All around you is a world which doesn't seem to have any normal bounds or structure. The hallway around you changes constantly. The colors, the texture, the lighting, and even the sounds twist and distort before your very eyes.

Room.Description: All around you is a world which doesn't seem to have any normal bounds or structure. The hallway around you changes constantly. The colors, the texture, the lighting, and even the sounds twist and distort before your very eyes.

Room.Name: Casual thoughts
Room.Description: All around you is a world which doesn't seem to have any normal bounds or structure. The hallway around you changes constantly. The colors, the texture, the lighting, and even the sounds twist and distort before your very eyes.

Room.Name: A bridge in consciousness
Room.Description: At this point in the path, everything seems to be extremely unstable. Wild vortexs of colors and random shapes gather around you making it hard for you to stand still. The ground under your feet seems to feel softer as waves begin to slowly grow beneath you. You think to yourself that you should move out of this room.

Room.Name: The beginning of the Id
Room.Description: Walking into this section of the hallway, you notice lots of interesting things. Besides the walls of solid gold and the presence of a yellow brick road, random items have been scattered everywhere. Large bundles of fruit, bottles of alcoholic beverages, large italian pastries, computer monitors and musical CD's can be seen in everywhere.

Room.Name: The Id
Room.Description: You are surrounded by all sorts of activities, pleasing and pleasurable to the eye. Scantily clad women and midgets walking around with serving trays of fine wine come to greet you. Trees bearing gold coins and jewels seem to be the dominant plant life here.

Room.Name: Inside the Id
Room.Description: You are surrounded by all sorts of activities, pleasing and pleasurable to the eye. Scantily clad women and midgets walking around with serving trays of fine wine come to greet you. Trees bearing gold coins and jewels seem to be the dominant plant life here.

Room.Name: Inside the Id
Room.Description: You are surrounded by all sorts of activities, pleasing and pleasurable to the eye. Scantily clad women and midgets walking around with serving trays of fine wine come to greet you. Trees bearing gold coins and jewels seem to be the dominant plant life here.

Room.Name: Inside the Id
Room.Description: This room is filled with the finest candies and chocolates. The floor beneath your feet looks to be made of gingerbread and cinnamin sticks. Kids tumble around being constantly walloped on the head with a large mallet which effortlessly flies through the air after them. The kids would yell out in pain if a muzzle hadn't been securely fastened over their tiny little mouths.

Room.Name: Inside the Id
Room.Description: This room is filled with the finest candies and chocolates. The floor beneath your feet looks to be made of gingerbread and cinnamin sticks. Room.Name: Inside the Id
Room.Description: You are surrounded by all sorts of activities, pleasing and pleasurable to the eye. Scantily clad women and midgets walking around with serving trays of fine wine come to greet you. Trees bearing gold coins and jewels seem to be the dominant plant life here.

Room.Name: Inside the Id
Room.Description: You've walked into a large lab filled with all sorts of experimental plant life and huge growing lamps. The tops of these pungent plants reach the top of the room leaving a crystalline residue trailing along the ceiling. Smoke slowly rises from the floor leaving you very light headed.

Room.Name: Inside the Id
Room.Description: You are surrounded by all sorts of activities, pleasing and pleasurable to the eye. Scantily clad women and midgets walking around with serving trays of fine wine come to greet you. Trees bearing gold coins and jewels seem to be the dominant plant life here.

Room.Description: You are surrounded by all sorts of activities, pleasing and pleasurable to the eye. Scantily clad women and midgets walking around with serving trays of fine wine come to greet you. Trees bearing gold coins and jewels seem to be the dominant plant life here.

Kids tumble around being constantly walloped on the head with a large mallet which effortlessly flies through the air after them. The kids would yell out in pain if a muzzle hadn't been securely fastened over their tiny little mouths.

Room.Name: Inside the Id
Room.Description: This room is filled with loud music coming from the walls and the ceilings. Young women and men are dancing their hearts out and heavily drinking beer. A smokey cloud is left hanging above them while multi-colored lights pierce through them on to the floor.

Room.Name: Inside the Id
Room.Description: This room is filled with loud music coming from the walls and the ceilings. Young women and men are dancing their hearts out and heavily drinking beer. A smokey cloud is left hanging above them while multi-colored lights pierce through them on to the floor.

Room.Description: This room is filled with loud music coming from the walls and the ceilings. Young women and men are dancing their hearts out and heavily drinking beer. A smokey cloud is left hanging above them while multi-colored lights pierce through them on to the floor.

Room.Name: A cornerstone in the Id
Room.Description: The corridor here seems to come to an end. A large waterfall of colorful liquors slowly pours upwards into a shallow pool on the ceiling. Stone figures of gargoyles and small animals playfully romp in and out of the pool inviting you to join them.

Room.Name: The train of thought
Room.Description: All around you is a world which doesn't seem to have any normal bounds or structure. The hallway around you changes constantly. The colors, the texture, the lighting, and even the sounds twist and distort before your very eyes. A long misty essence seems to travel down the path ahead of you.

Room.Name: A misty vortex
Room.Description: At this point in the path, everything seems to be extremely unstable. Wild vortexs of colors and random shapes gather around you making it hard for you to stand still. The ground under your feet seems to feel softer as waves begin to slowly grow beneath you. The misty essence flowing through the room seems to branch off in two directions: east and west.

Room.Name: Towards the back corner of the mind
Room.Description: This room is more placent than the previous rooms visited in this strange place. What this room has instead is a soft illumination emanating from the floor and a light breeze carrying the soft misty chain deeper into the depths of the cave.

Room.Name: Towards the back corner of the mind
Room.Description: This room is more placent than the previous rooms visited in this strange place. What this room has instead is a soft illumination emanating from the floor and a light breeze carrying the soft misty chain deeper into the depths of the cave.

Room.Description: This room is more placent than the previous rooms visited in this strange place. What this room has instead is a soft illumination emanating from the floor and a light breeze carrying the soft misty chain deeper into the depths of the cave.

Room.Description: This room is more placent than the previous rooms visited in this strange place. What this room has instead is a soft illumination emanating from the floor and a light breeze carrying the soft misty chain deeper into the depths of the cave.

Room.Name: Towards the back corner of the mind
Room.Description: This room is more placent than the previous rooms visited in this strange place. What this room has instead is a soft illumination emanating from the floor and a light breeze carrying the soft misty chain deeper into the depths of the cave.

Room.Name: Back corner of the mind
Room.Description: The room around you suddenly shifts into that of a dark room covered in blackened stone. A smell of mold and decay seems to set in as moisture from the ceiling slowly drops down on top of you. Around you is the constant sound of skittering feet on the floor.

Room.Name: Back corner of the mind
Room.Description: The dark room you have entered is covered in blackened stone. A smell of mold and decay seems to set in as moisture from the ceiling slowly drops down on top of you. Around you is the constant sound of skittering feet on the floor.

The colors, the texture, the lighting, and even the sounds twist and distort before your very eyes. A long misty essence seems to travel down the path ahead of you.

Room.Name: Deeper in the psyche
Room.Description: When you enter this room everything begins to come alive. The walls, the floor, the strange plants and pictures all around begin to speak to you. You can barely tell what direction you are travelling now. The colors, the texture, the lighting, and even the sounds twist and distort even more so than before. The misty trail continues down the corridor.

The misty trail continues down the corridor.

Room.Name: Deeper in the psyche
Room.Description: When you enter this room everything begins to come alive. The walls, the floor, the strange plants and pictures all around begin to speak to you. You can barely tell what direction you are travelling now. The colors, the texture, the lighting, and even the sounds twist and distort even more so than before. The misty trail continues down the corridor.

Room.Name: Deeper in the psyche
Room.Description: When you enter this room everything begins to come alive. The walls, the floor, the strange plants and pictures all around begin to speak to you. You can barely tell what direction you are travelling now. The colors, the texture, the lighting, and even the sounds twist and distort even more so than before. The misty trail continues down the corridor.

You can barely tell what direction you are travelling now. The colors, the texture, the lighting, and even the sounds twist and distort even more so than before. The misty trail continues down the corridor.

Room.Name: Entering the consciousness
Room.Description: When you enter this room everything begins to come alive. The walls, the floor, the strange plants and pictures all around begin to speak to you. You can barely tell what direction you are travelling now. The colors, the texture, the lighting, and even the sounds twist and distort even more so than before. The misty trail becomes very thick here almost covering up the entire corridor.

Room.Name: A stream of consciousness
Room.Description: The corridor once around you all of a sudden turns to mist. Looking around you, you see nothing but more and more of the mist. You take your hand to the wall and attempt to move the mist away. To your surprise behind the mist you see a star filled sky that goes on for miles and miles.

Room.Name: A stream of consciousness
Room.Description: The corridor once around you all of a sudden turns to mist. Looking around you, you see nothing but more and more of the mist. You take your hand to the wall and attempt to move the mist away. To your surprise behind the mist you see a star filled sky that goes on for miles and miles.

Room.Name: A shadowy room
Room.Description: You enter a room covered in a green metallic room with a being sitting against the western wall. Energy crackles all around as the being slowly rises to his feet and stares at your direction. Once he is standing you start to hear a silent chorus chanting someone's name.

Room.Name: A stream of consciousness
Room.Description: The corridor once around you all of a sudden turns to mist. Looking around you, you see nothing but more and more of the mist. You take your hand to the wall and attempt to move the mist away. To your surprise behind the mist you see a star filled sky that goes on for miles and miles.

Room.Name: Outer reaches of the mind
Room.Description: Walking into this room is somewhat of a shock to you to find that all the mist around you has started to become somewhat flammable. The mist begins to explode like fireworks raining colorful sparkles of red and green all around. Through this display you can barely see a path forming before you're eyes.

Room.Name: Outer reaches of the mind
Room.Description: Walking into this room is somewhat of a shock to you to find that all the mist around you has started to become somewhat flammable. The mist begins to explode like fireworks raining colorful sparkles of red and green all around. Through this display you can barely see a path forming before you're eyes.

Room.Name: Outer reaches of the mind
Room.Description: Walking into this room is somewhat of a shock to you to find that all the mist around you has started to become somewhat flammable. The mist begins to explode like fireworks raining colorful sparkles of red and green all around. Through this display you can barely see a path forming before you're eyes. You notice a large wooden door within all the chaos on the east door.

Room.Name: Outer reaches of the mind
Room.Description: Walking into this room is somewhat of a shock to you to find that all the mist around you has started to become somewhat flammable. The mist begins to explode like fireworks raining colorful sparkles of red and green all around. Through this display you can barely see a path forming before you're eyes.

Room.Name: A shadowy room
Room.Description: You enter a room covered in a green metallic room with a being sitting against the western wall. Energy crackles all around as the being slowly rises to his feet and stares at your direction. Once he is standing you start to hear a silent chorus chanting someone's name.

Room.Name: A shadowy room
Room.Description: You enter a room covered in a green metallic room with a being sitting against the western wall. Energy crackles all around as the being slowly rises to his feet and stares at your direction. Once he is standing you start to hear a silent chorus chanting someone's name.

Room.Name: Entering the subconscious
Room.Description: After entering the door, everything becomes quiet. So quiet you think that this place could not be a part of what you have seen thus far. It seems that you are entering some sort of grove in the middle of the woods. Wild flowers and lush trees can be found all around with small animals playing oblivious to your presence.

Room.Name: The subconscious
Room.Description: It seems that you are entering some sort of grove in the middle of the woods. Wild flowers and lush trees can be found all around with small animals playing oblivious to your presence.

Room.Name: The subconscious
Room.Description: It seems that you are entering some sort of grove in the middle of the woods. Wild flowers and lush trees can be found all around with small animals playing oblivious to your presence.

Room.Name: The subconscious
Room.Description: It seems that you are entering some sort of grove in the middle of the woods. Wild flowers and lush trees can be found all around with small animals playing oblivious to your presence.

Room.Name: The subconscious
Room.Description: It seems that you are entering some sort of grove in the middle of the woods. Wild flowers and lush trees can be found all around with small animals playing oblivious to your presence.

Room.Name: The subconscious
Room.Description: It seems that you are entering some sort of grove in the middle of the woods. Wild flowers and lush trees can be found all around with small animals playing oblivious to your presence.

Room.Name: The subconscious
Room.Description: It seems that you are entering some sort of grove in the middle of the woods. Wild flowers and lush trees can be found all around with small animals playing oblivious to your presence.

Room.Name: The subconscious
Room.Description: It seems that you are entering some sort of grove in the middle of the woods. Wild flowers and lush trees can be found all around with small animals playing oblivious to your presence.

Room.Name: The grand entrance
Room.Description: The grove which you were just in as led you to a large gate made of wooden poles and brass rings. A sign hangs over the top of the gate.

ExtraDescription.Description: The sign reads, "WELCOME TO AMUSEMENT PARK!"

Room.Name: Just inside the park
Room.Description: You have entered what looked to be a normal park from the outside of the gate but is now much more than what was expected. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: A small carousel
Room.Description: At this point of the park, a small carousel is here barely operational for use. Small goblin-like creatures are using it for whatever reasons they come up with.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: A refuse pit
Room.Description: Inside the park you come to find a blackened pit filled with old bones of animals, people, and other inhuman creatures. A large dragon sits at the edge of this pit skillfully cleaning the carcass of its last victim.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: An empty sandbox
Room.Description: Coming to this point of the park you see a large box sitting in the middle of the grass. Little remains of the sand that was once in this box for children to play with and from the looks of the two kids still here they are looking to blame someone.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: A set of park benches
Room.Description: This part of the park is somewhat unused from the rest. Grass is slightly overgrown and weeds are starting to kill the wild flowers. Set in the middle of all this is a worn out pair of park benches which are currently occupied by a bitter old couple. Seems they are mad because no one will cut the grass.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The park of the absurd
Room.Description: You are now in the midst of this hellish park. The animals which were romping about outside of the gates are now grinning evily at you, flesh slowly rotting off their bodies. Kids who were playing are now fighting, looking to slay each other by any means possible. Clowns are overlooking everything with mischevious grins bearing razor sharp teeth.

Room.Name: The throne of a madman
Room.Description: After stepping into this grove, everything around you changes into nothing but blackness. You cannot even see the clothes you wear. You say something aloud and cannot even hear yourself speak. An overwhelming fear grips your heart as you realize you are in total emptiness. Suddenly a light from in front of you begins to emanate a red glow bright enough for you to see a man sitting on a throne made of a large skeleton.

Room.Name: Into the Abyss of the Mind
Into the Abyss of the Mind
Into the Abyss of the Mind

NPC.name: kid irritated
NPC.description: A small kid stands here fighting away at his muzzle while trying to duck the nearby floating mallet.
NPC.longDescription: A small kid is foaming at the mouth through his muzzle.

NPC.name: purple cloud
NPC.description: The mist around you seems to have certain condensed beings that move around as an entity.
NPC.longDescription: A transculent purple cloud floats slowly around the room.

NPC.name: floating lights
NPC.description: Before you is a series of white lights floating a few feet above the ground.
NPC.longDescription: A series of floating white lights seem to hover before you.

NPC.name: small vortex
NPC.description: You see that the intersections of mist have caused a disturbance in the air, creating this chaotic twister of wind.
NPC.longDescription: A vortex of air and debris stands here in your path.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: half naked woman
NPC.description: A woman dressed in a leather bikini top and a thong stares right back at you waiting to see what you will do.
NPC.longDescription: A scantily clad woman approaches you with desire in her eyes.

NPC.name: midget servant
NPC.description: A small man stands here before you with a tray full of exotic drinks.
NPC.longDescription: A midget stands here with tray in hand waiting to serve you.

NPC.name: floating mallet
NPC.description: Other than flying and moving at a high rate of speed, this mallet looks as ordinary as any other wooden mallet you would see.
NPC.longDescription: A mallet busily flies through the air chasing little children.

NPC.name: male dancer
NPC.description: A man dressed in velvet pants and a leopard skinned jacket is here dancing. He looks like he's having a good time.
NPC.longDescription: A man dressed in velvet pants and a leopard skinned jacket is here dancing.

NPC.name: female dancer
NPC.description: A young woman dressed in colorful clothes is here dancing her heart out.
NPC.longDescription: A young woman dressed in colorful clothes is here dancing her heart out.

NPC.name: stone gargoyle
NPC.description: A large stone gargoyle is sitting here overlooking the area. Eventually the creatures eyes look over in your direction.
NPC.longDescription: A large stone gargoyle is sitting here overlooking the area.

NPC.name: tiny squirrel
NPC.description: A small furry squirrel sees you staring at him and looks right back at you with a big smile.
NPC.longDescription: A small squirrel is happily running around the room.

NPC.name: happy clam
NPC.description: Well, you see a happy clam on the ground before you.
NPC.longDescription: A small clam stareQ up at you with a big smile.

NPC.name: muck scavenger
NPC.description: Before you is a large lizard unlike any you've seen before. Covered in dark green and black scales the creature looks at you and hisses.
NPC.longDescription: A large lizard moves sleekly through the shadows.

NPC.name: giant scarab
NPC.description: A large bug with glistening scales looks around the floor in search of fresh meat.
NPC.longDescription: A giant bug is sitting here looking for some flesh to feast on.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AssistRace

NPC.name: living picture
NPC.description: A large painting is here on a wall attempting to talk about philosophy with you.
NPC.longDescription: A large painting is here trying to hold a conversation with you.

NPC.name: shooting star
NPC.description: You see a star flying past you at lightning speed with a trail of cosmic dust behind it.
NPC.longDescription: A shooting star flies past you at blinding speed.

NPC.name: man sebastian
NPC.description: A large man dressed in formal attire is here holding a large crimson sword. He looks at you and decides now is not the time for business. He simply wants to rend you to shreds.
NPC.longDescription: A large man dressed in formal attire is here holding a large crimson sword.

NPC.name: catfish fish giant
NPC.description: A huge catfish is lounging around in a pool of cool refreshing water. He barely seems to notice you being more concerned with relaxation.
NPC.longDescription: A large fish seems to be swimming around in a large pool of water.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil DetectIllusion

NPC.name: man moon
NPC.description: A man with a prominent chin is here sitting on the end of a crescent moon. He's looking up at the stars and singing whatever tune comes to mind.
NPC.longDescription: You see a man sitting on the end of a crescent moon.

NPC.name: trevor man
NPC.description: The man before you is huge and quite intimidating. Magical energies crackle around him as the room itself seems to bend and shape to his will.
NPC.longDescription: A huge man dressed in black priestly robes stands before you crackling with evil energy.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionGood Flying PassDoor DetectIllusion

NPC.name: pookie cat tiger
NPC.description: A large well groomed tiger is here cleaning herself. It quickly notices a change in the air of the room and starts to lick her lips grin.
NPC.longDescription: A large tiger is here cleaning herself from the last meal she ate.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionEvil DarkVision

NPC.name: patches cat
NPC.description: Before you is the biggest kitten you've ever seen. This cat has been fed way too many meals and wishes nothing more but to sleep away the day. Unfortunately this cat hates company and has decided to have one more snack before bed time, namely YOU!
NPC.longDescription: A huge kitten sits here doing its best not to move.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary Infrared ProtectionGood DarkVision

NPC.name: hellion kid
NPC.description: A little kid sits here with red glowing eyes and sharp little teeth.
NPC.longDescription: A little kid sits here with red glowing eyes and sharp little teeth.

NPC.name: killer clown
NPC.description: At first appearance this man looks like an ordinary clown. Upon closer inspection you see an evil grin and a mouth full of razor sharped teeth.
NPC.longDescription: A jester of some sort looks at you with gleaming white teeth.

NPC.name: zombie chipmunk
NPC.description: A small and once furry animal is here standing before you, rotted flesh hanging from its body.
NPC.longDescription: A small chipmunk is now walking with the living dead.

NPC.name: undead sparrow
NPC.description: A decaying bird flutters before you just barely able to keep in flight.
NPC.longDescription: A decaying bird flutters before you just barely able to keep in flight.

NPC.name: goblin boy
NPC.description: A small goblin looks up at you with childish yet evil eyes.
NPC.longDescription: A small goblin is here looking to pull some sort of prank.

NPC.name: cadence girl
NPC.description: A tiny girl is here covered it what little sand was left in her sandbox. Obviously looking for someone to blame she turns directly at you. She grins evily as foam begins to fall from her mouth.
NPC.longDescription: A little girl is here angry at you for disturbing her playtime.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: ethan boy
NPC.description: A young boy is here looking to his sister who is very upset. In the blink of an eye he starts to glow a crimson red and suddenly turns to look at you.
NPC.longDescription: A young boy is looking to seek revenge for his sister's misery.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack

NPC.name: grimlock refuse dragon
NPC.description: A large black dragon can be seen here covered in muck and chewing on bones. He casually looks over at you and sees that you are still moving. He likes his meat fresh.
NPC.longDescription: A large black dragon can be seen here covered in muck and chewing on bones.
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionGood DetectIllusion Infrared Flying

NPC.name: old man stewart
NPC.description: An old man sits here trying to keep his wife quiet. He casually chews on his gums and watches the area around him.
NPC.longDescription: An old man sits here irritated by his angry wife.

NPC.name: stewart woman
NPC.description: An old woman with frizzy hair is here yelling at the park bench she's sitting on.
NPC.longDescription: An old woman with frizzy hair is here yelling at the park bench.

NPC.name: spirit madman man
NPC.description: The man behind this madness is here before you, basking in his power as he sits on his throne. Looking at him, you have no idea what he plans to do with you.
NPC.longDescription: A man in dark clothing sits here in a throne made of a large skeleton.
NPC.flags: NPC Sentinel Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionEvil ProtectionGood DetectIllusion PassDoor DarkVision

NPC.name: mangler machine
NPC.description: Before you is the most disturbing contraption you have ever seen. What was a huge iron furnace has now been corrupted with evil energies and artistic qualities making the perfect killing machine.
NPC.longDescription: A large machine of destruction is here waiting to devour your body and soul.
NPC.flags: NPC Aggressive StayArea Warrior AreaAttack Fade
NPC.affectedBy: DetectInvis DetectHidden Sanctuary ProtectionGood Berserk DetectIllusion

Item.Name: large italian pastry
Item.LongDescription: A wonderful pastry lies here on the ground carelessly neglected.

Item.Name: bar gold
Item.LongDescription: A solid bar of gold lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: gem amethyst
Item.LongDescription: A small purple gem has been left here carelessly.

Item.Name: red quartz choker
Item.LongDescription: You see a choker adorned with red quartz lying on the ground.

Item.Name: gem sapphire
Item.LongDescription: A large blue gem sits here covered in dust.

Item.Name: candy cane
Item.LongDescription: A red and white striped piece of candy is here on the ground.

Item.Name: box chocolates chocolate
Item.LongDescription: A small box of chocolates has been left here on the ground.

Item.Name: ginger gingerbread
Item.LongDescription: A small piece of gingerbread has been left here for someone to eat.

Item.Name: leather muzzle
Item.LongDescription: A leather strapped muzzle lies here on the ground having been removed by force.

Item.Name: hot velvet pants
Item.LongDescription: A pair of velvet pants are lying crumpled up on the ground.

Item.Name: pair eyes kalediscope
Item.LongDescription: A pair of colorful glasses lies here on the floor.

Item.Name: scarab carapace
Item.LongDescription: A scarab's carapace has been fashioned into a bracelet.

Item.Name: shard blackened obsidian stone
Item.LongDescription: A shard of blackened stone is here on the ground.

Item.Name: misty purple potion
Item.LongDescription: A purple misty potion has been left here for someone to pick up.

Item.Name: scales refuse dragon
Item.ShortDescription: some scales of the refuse dragon
Item.LongDescription: A large set of slimy scales lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: leggings tiger
Item.ShortDescription: a pair of tiger skin leggings
Item.LongDescription: A pair of tiger skin leggings is laying here freshly cut.

Item.Name: crimson avenger
Item.LongDescription: A large ornate sword is covered in a red hue and pulsing with evil. energies.

Item.Name: armguards fortitude
Item.LongDescription: A set of transparent armguards lies on the ground before you.

Item.Name: blue eye
Item.LongDescription: A blue eue is here dangling from a silver chain.

Item.Name: blue silver coat
Item.LongDescription: A coat made of blue and silver is here shimmering before you.

Item.Name: crystalline bracelet
Item.LongDescription: A crystalline bracelet carved with ancient runes is lying on the ground.

Item.Name: crystalline wrietguard guard
Item.LongDescription: A crystallineguard carved with ancient runes is lying on the ground.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow Hum Magic AntiNeutral NoRemove BurnProof NoUncurse

Item.Name: patches claw
Item.LongDescription: A large feline claw has been severed and left on the ground.

Item.Name: orb destruction
Item.LongDescription: A simple orb sits here on the ground forcing you to pick it up.

Item.Name: flower tower straw
Item.LongDescription: A small tiara has been made with wilted flowers and straw.

Item.Name: hammer energy
Item.LongDescription: Something in the shape of a hammer shines brightly on the floor of the room.
Item.ExtraFlags: Glow BurnProof Frost Sharp TwoHands Poison Unholy

Item.Name: old cane
Item.LongDescription: An old cane sits here against the wall.

Item.Name: potion healing water
Item.LongDescription: A potion of glowing liquid lies here on the ground.

Item.Name: old handbag bag
Item.LongDescription: An old handbag has been left here probably by some old person.

Item.Name: potion clear eyes
Item.LongDescription: On the floor before you is a potion labelled "Clear Eyes".

Item.Name: pendant eternal spirit
Item.LongDescription: An ancient pendant containing a large gem lies here on the ground.
